title: Yet more vvorke for a Masse-priest
author: Cooke, Alexander, 1564-1632.
publisher: Printed by William Iones, and are to be sold by William Sheffard at his shop in Popes head Ally,
notes: A revision of "More worke for a Masse-priest", in turn a much-expanded version of "Worke for a Masse-priest".
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
